FOR THOSE WHO HAVE A QUESTION STRIKING "WHAT IS INTERNAL?" REPEATEDLY.
ANSWER (by the uploader himself):-

Note: This release is meant for our sites, its ops and users, and those who
request it. We've labeled it "INTERNAL" because the DRM is bypassed using a
loader. The game works, but it's not how we would usually release a crack
A more proper way of cracking it exists, but would take extra time. The
rules we follow also do not allow for loaders of this kind to be released,
and it seems unlikely that new rules will come.

http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/FIFA-Soccer-13.html

Minimum requirements

OS: Windows Vista SP1 / Windows 7
CPU: 1.8 GHz Core 2 Duo
RAM: 2GB RAM for Windows Vista & Windows 7
Disc Drive: DVD-ROM at 8x Speed
Hard Drive: 8.0 GB, with additional space required for saved games and DirectX 9.0c installation
Video: 3D accelerated 256 MB video card with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
Minimum Supported Video Cards: ATI Radeon HD 3600, NVIDIA GeForce 6800GT
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
DirectX: 9.0c
Input: Keyboard, Mouse, Dual Analogue gamepad, VOIP Headset
Single System Multiplayer: 2-5 players on 1 PC

All of you getting ctd and crush dumps here is how i got it to work:
1.Uninstall game and any save game.
2. Create a new user account as admin!
3.Name it with english alphabet (User or something like that)
4.Restart pc and login as User.
5.Install game and crack it.
6.Go to fifaconfig and choose resolution and graphic settings.
7.Start with fifa13.exe 
8.Now the game should work without the problems.
9.Enjoy!!

Here is the solution for the crash before starting the match:
1- Copy the crack to the game folder.
2- Download the origin : http://www.origin.com/ie/download.
3- Sign up for an account in the origin.
4 -Open the origin then select ((Application Settings)) then go to ((Browse Game Installers)), an empty folder will be opened.
5 -Copy the whole FiFA 13 folder into that empty folder, then run the game from that folder.
6- Enjoy playing the matches.

NOTE : If the game asked you for a key to play online, just press cancel and it will continue.

If anyone has the graphics bug where there is a "gray plane" that covers most of the screen and players, and seems to be in random game modes

I went into Nvidia control panel, and changed Anti-aliasing to "application controlled" and that fixed it.

To all the guys who are having problem of crash dump follow the following steps:
1. Goto c/progamfiles/fifa13/game/fifasetup folder.
2. Open the file fifasetup_default.txt
3. Change the resolution wiidth, height and the aspect ratio according to your laptops..mine is 1366x768 with AR of 16:9
4. change voicechat to 0.
5.Save the file and open the game..
It worked perfectly for me..I hope it works for you guys too..you will also be needing the windows media player in your pc.
!!!HOW TO CHANGE RESOLUTION IN FIFA 13!!!

here is a good collection of various fixes for freezes and crashes:
http://www.fifa-infinity.com/fifa-13/fifa-13-bug-fixes/

finally ... I got the loader to work with all other languages! the problem was that it only works with a mod/different/bigger data7.big + data7.sh file. Filesize 168 mb instead of 160 mb.

detailled instructions + dl-links can be found here:
http://www.soccergaming.com/forums/showpost.php?p=3311149&postcount=100

to sum up you have to:
1. copy/replace all the commentary languages you want in your fifa Game folder - normally 4 files per language (example: ger_de.bh, ger_de.big, german_de.bh, german_de.big) 
if you have the multi12 version they might already be installed idk (if not just mount the iso & replace the files)
and if you like me have the Reloaded-Internal-Version (Multi3/5/6 whatever version) you can find single commentary-language dl-links here atm (hotfile mirror): 
http://ddlgratuit.com/fifa-13-patch/fifa-13-commentaries/fifa-13-language-commentary-files.html
2. get the total commentary mod by doctor+ modified/bigger data7.big/sh from the soccergaming forum-link/Skydrive (I didn't find it anywhere else):
http://www.soccergaming.com/forums/showpost.php?p=3311149&postcount=100
3. I don't know if this step is really necessary - however it doesn't hurt either especially if you don't have the reloaded-version:
- get FHL-BH-Editor from here:
http://editing.myfhl.de/FHL-BH-Editor/ddet/id/10
- open the programm (it should automatically dectect your game folder etc) and click on regenerate all bh-files (+ext) then close it
4. run the game and select the commentary language you want ingame. Now it should work without any crashes whatsoever - excepct the fifa related ones. LOL
and yes, all this works WITHOUT that origin crap.

- does your system meet the minimum requirements
- did you run fifaconfig before you started the game (if not delete fifasetup.ini in Documents folder then rerun fifaconfig to choose/save your settings)
- graphic card drivers/directx up to date?
- is wmp installed & running on your system (sadly a requirement!)
- did you set replay0.bin in Documents folder to read-only
- does your windows-username contain any special characters
- ...
